paramInformation.label: Number of Pixels
paramInformation.description: When individually addressable LEDs are used, this parameter tells the controller the number of pixels that are attached.  0: Automatic recognition of pixels.

paramInformation.label: Dimming Speed
paramInformation.description: This changes the speed in which the light strip dims up or down. A setting of 0 should turn the light immediately on or off (almost like an on/off switch). Increasing the value should slow down the transition speed.

paramInformation.label: Ramp Rate
paramInformation.description: This changes the speed in which the light strip turns on or off. For example, when a user sends the switch a basicSet(value: 0xFF) or basicSet(value: 0x00), this is the speed in which those actions take place. A setting of 0 should turn the light immediately on or off (almost like an on/off switch). Increasing the value should slow down the transition speed. A setting of 99 should keep this in sync with parameter 2.

paramInformation.label: Minimum Level
paramInformation.description: The minimum level that the strip can be dimmed to. Useful when the user has an LED strip that does not turn on or flickers at a lower level.

paramInformation.label: Maximum Level
paramInformation.description: The maximum level that the strip can be dimmed to. Useful when the user has an LED strip that reaches its maximum level before the dimmer value of 99.

paramInformation.label: Auto Off Timer
paramInformation.description: After the strip is turned on, turn it off automatically after this time.

paramInformation.label: Default Level (Local)
paramInformation.description: Default level for the strip when it is powered on from the local switch. A setting of 0 means that the switch will return to the level that it was on before it was turned off.

paramInformation.label: Default Level (Z-Wave)
paramInformation.description: Default level for the dimmer when it is powered on from a Z-Wave command (i.e. BasicSet(0xFF)). A setting of 0 means that the switch will return to the level that it was on before it was turned off.

paramInformation.label: Default Color: Hue Color
paramInformation.description: Set the default color to a Hue Color Wheel color. Allowable Range: 1 - 360.

paramInformation.label: Active Power Reports
paramInformation.description: The power level change that will result in a new power report being sent. The value is relative to the previous report.

paramInformation.label: Periodic Power & Energy Reports
paramInformation.description: Time period between consecutive power & energy reports being sent. The timer is reset after each report is sent.

paramInformation.label: Energy Reports
paramInformation.description: The energy level change that will result in a new energy report being sent.

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect: Hue Color Wheel / Color Temp
paramInformation.description: If 'Quick Strip Effect: Color Type' is set to 'Hue Color Wheel', this is the hue color wheel value.  To calculate value, value = hue_color_wheel_value / 360 * 255.  If 'Quick Strip Effect: Color Type' is set to 'Color Temp', this is the color temp value.  To calculate value, value = (color_temp_value - 2700) / (6500 - 2700) * 255.

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect Intensity
paramInformation.description: Intensity of the LED strip. Coarse: 0 - 10, where 10 = 100%. Fine: 0-99, where 99 = 100%.

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect Intensity Scale
paramInformation.description: Changes the scale of the intensity. 0 = Coarse (10 x Intensity), 1 = Fine (1 x Intensity).

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect: Duration
paramInformation.description: The light LED strip effect duration. 1 to 60 = seconds, 61 to 120 minutes, 121 - 254 = hours, 255 = Indefinitely.

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect: Effect
paramInformation.description: The light LED strip effect.

paramInformation.label: Quick Strip Effect: Color Type
paramInformation.description: Color type for the effect.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 1 Effect
paramInformation.description: This is the effect of Action 1.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 1 Color
paramInformation.description: This is the color of Action 1.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 2 Effect
paramInformation.description: This is the effect of Action 2.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 2 Color
paramInformation.description: This is the color of Action 2.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 3 Effect
paramInformation.description: This is the effect of Action 3.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 3 Color
paramInformation.description: This is the color of Action 3.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 4 Effect
paramInformation.description: This is the effect of Action 4.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 4 Color
paramInformation.description: This is the color of Action 4.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 1 Intensity
paramInformation.description: This is the intensity of Action 1.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 2 Intensity
paramInformation.description: This is the intensity of Action 2.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 3 Intensity
paramInformation.description: This is the intensity of Action 3.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Action 4 Intensity
paramInformation.description: This is the intensity of Action 4.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Duration 1
paramInformation.description: Duration of the Action 1 Effect.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Duration 2
paramInformation.description: Duration of the Action 2 Effect.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Duration 3
paramInformation.description: Duration of the Action 3 Effect.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Duration 4
paramInformation.description: Duration of the Action 4 Effect.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Iterations
paramInformation.description: Number of times the custom effect will occur.  Iterations x (Action 1 -> Action 2 -> Action 3 -> Action 4).

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Behavior
paramInformation.description: What will occur after the Custom Effect is Finished.

paramInformation.label: Custom Strip Effect: Duration Units
paramInformation.description: Units of the Duration for Parameter 24.

paramInformation.label: Pixel Effect
paramInformation.description: Pixel Effect that utilizes the individually addressable LEDs.

paramInformation.label: Pixel Effect Intensity
paramInformation.description: This is the intensity of the Pixel Effect.

paramInformation.label: Disable Physical On/Off Delay
paramInformation.description: The 700ms delay that occurs after pressing the physical button to turn the switch on/off is removed. Consequently this also removes the following scenes: 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x tap. Still working are the 1x tap, held, released, and the level up/down scenes.
